Using Yelp in Barcelona was a little challenging since really only tourists are reviewing but this one turned out to be a truly good find.  We stumbled around Barcelona trying to find someplace to eat since our first choice had a line out the door and around the building.  Yelp led us here and we are happy it did.  We happened on the last table of the night.  We didnt realize it was a set menu and it was much more than we had planned on spending for the night but it was a great experience, especially after having so many tapas.  We were ready for an actual meal.  Everything was outstanding.  The wine that our server recommended was perfect, the leek soup was amazing, suckling pig was rich but so good, only thing that we didnt think was the best was a steak special that was not cooked enough.  It was pretty rare inside but the flavor was good and it definitely was like butter.  This is an expensive dinner though just so you yelpers know, especially after eating and drinking at tapas bars for a total bill of $50 you need to be ok tripling that price here.  If not then this isnt for you.
